org.dhbw.geo.hardware

Class HardwareController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.hardware.HardwareController

  • public class HardwareController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Oliver on 23.05.2015. Class used to control hardware settings such as Wifi, Bluetooth and Audio.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HardwareController getInstance()
        Access point for the singleton
        Returns:

      • isWifiEnabled

        public boolean isWifiEnabled()
        Returns the current status of the Wifi setting.
        Returns:
        True: Wifi is on, false: Wifi is off

      • setWifi

        public void setWifi(boolean newStatus)
        Sets the status of the Wifi setting.
        Parameters:
        newStatus - True: Turn Wifi on, false: Turn Wifi off

      • getAudioStatus

        public boolean getAudioStatus(int stream)
        Gets the current status of a specific audio stream
        Parameters:
        stream - stream ID: AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, AudioManager.STREAM_RING, AudioManager.STREAM_ALARM
        Returns:
        true for sound on, false for mute

      • setAudioStatus

        public void setAudioStatus(int stream,
                           boolean status)
        Sets the status for a certain audio stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Stream ID: AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, AudioManager.STREAM_RING, AudioManager.STREAM_ALARM
        status - true for sound on, false for mute

      • setAudioVolume

        public void setAudioVolume(int stream,
                           int volume)
        Sets the volume for a certain audio stream. Will also unmute the stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - stream Stream ID: AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, AudioManager.STREAM_RING, AudioManager.STREAM_ALARM
        volume -

      • getBluetoothStatus

        public boolean getBluetoothStatus()
        Returns the current status of the Bluetooth setting.
        Returns:
        True: Bluetooth is on, false: Bluetooth is off

      • setBluetoothStatus

        public void setBluetoothStatus(boolean status)
        Sets the status of the Bluetooth setting.
        Parameters:
        status - True: Turn Bluetooth on, false: Turn Bluetooth off
